subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Arizona Coach Lute Olson is extending his leave from the team through the end of the season after filing for divorce earlier this week, Olson’s lawyer, Leonard Karp, said Friday.
snippet: Arizona Coach Lute Olson is extending his leave from the team through the end of the season after filing for divorce earlier this week, Olson’s lawyer, Leonard Karp, said Friday.
